html: (2 Nephi 23:2)."A [my] banner." The banner to be raised up is the battle flag or standard of the Lord. By inserting the word "my" before "banner," the Joseph Smith Translation makes it clear that this standard is the Lord's. (JST Isaiah 13:2.) This rallying standard unites the righteousof the world in the common cause of Christ. (See commentary for Isaiah 11:12 and 2 Nephi 21:12.)
